author: sjur
msg: Added i18n matching to the source file lookup, thus allowing l10n of page content for wiki-format pages:
can be used to serve localised content using the simple markup format of wikis.
We have used this setup for jspwiki for months at our site, so should work without problems. But it is not tested for the other wiki formats.

author: felixk
msg: Revert update of maven-eclipse-plugin. Even eclipse:eclipse doesn't generated any .project nor .classpath files...
